00019 #include "camera.h"
00020 #include "scene.h"

00022 #include "util_vector.h"

00026 Camera::Camera()
00027 {
00028     shutteropen = 0.0f;
00029     shutterclose = 1.0f;
00030 
00031     aperturesize = 0.0f;
00032     focaldistance = 10.0f;
00033     blades = 0;
00034     bladesrotation = 0.0f;
00035 
00036     matrix = transform_identity();
00037 
00038     type = CAMERA_PERSPECTIVE;
00039     fov = M_PI_F/4.0f;
00040 
00041     nearclip = 1e-5f;
00042     farclip = 1e5f;
00043 
00044     width = 1024;
00045     height = 512;
00046 
00047     left = -((float)width/(float)height);
00048     right = (float)width/(float)height;
00049     bottom = -1.0f;
00050     top = 1.0f;
00051 
00052     screentoworld = transform_identity();
00053     rastertoworld = transform_identity();
00054     ndctoworld = transform_identity();
00055     rastertocamera = transform_identity();
00056     cameratoworld = transform_identity();
00057     worldtoraster = transform_identity();
00058 
00059     dx = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00060     dy = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00061 
00062     need_update = true;
00063     need_device_update = true;
00064 }
00065 
00066 Camera::~Camera()
00067 {
00068 }
00069 
00070 void Camera::update()
00071 {
00072     if(!need_update)
00073         return;
00074     
00075     /* ndc to raster */
00076     Transform screentocamera;
00077     Transform ndctoraster = transform_scale(width, height, 1.0f);
00078 
00079     /* raster to screen */
00080     Transform screentoraster = ndctoraster;
00081     
00082     screentoraster = ndctoraster *
00083         transform_scale(1.0f/(right - left), 1.0f/(top - bottom), 1.0f) *
00084         transform_translate(-left, -bottom, 0.0f);
00085 
00086     Transform rastertoscreen = transform_inverse(screentoraster);
00087 
00088     /* screen to camera */
00089     if(type == CAMERA_PERSPECTIVE)
00090         screentocamera = transform_inverse(transform_perspective(fov, nearclip, farclip));
00091     else if(type == CAMERA_ORTHOGRAPHIC)
00092         screentocamera = transform_inverse(transform_orthographic(nearclip, farclip));
00093     else
00094         screentocamera = transform_identity();
00095 
00096     rastertocamera = screentocamera * rastertoscreen;
00097 
00098     cameratoworld = matrix;
00099     screentoworld = cameratoworld * screentocamera;
00100     rastertoworld = cameratoworld * rastertocamera;
00101     ndctoworld = rastertoworld * ndctoraster;
00102     worldtoraster = transform_inverse(rastertoworld);
00103 
00104     /* differentials */
00105     if(type == CAMERA_ORTHOGRAPHIC) {
00106         dx = transform_direction(&rastertocamera, make_float3(1, 0, 0));
00107         dy = transform_direction(&rastertocamera, make_float3(0, 1, 0));
00108     }
00109     else if(type == CAMERA_PERSPECTIVE) {
00110         dx = transform_perspective(&rastertocamera, make_float3(1, 0, 0)) -
00111              transform_perspective(&rastertocamera, make_float3(0, 0, 0));
00112         dy = transform_perspective(&rastertocamera, make_float3(0, 1, 0)) -
00113              transform_perspective(&rastertocamera, make_float3(0, 0, 0));
00114     }
00115     else {
00116         dx = make_float3(0, 0, 0);
00117         dy = make_float3(0, 0, 0);
00118     }
00119 
00120     dx = transform_direction(&cameratoworld, dx);
00121     dy = transform_direction(&cameratoworld, dy);
00122 
00123     need_update = false;
00124     need_device_update = true;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void Camera::device_update(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00128 {
00129     update();
00130 
00131     if(!need_device_update)
00132         return;
00133     
00134     KernelCamera *kcam = &dscene->data.cam;
00135 
00136     /* store matrices */
00137     kcam->screentoworld = screentoworld;
00138     kcam->rastertoworld = rastertoworld;
00139     kcam->ndctoworld = ndctoworld;
00140     kcam->rastertocamera = rastertocamera;
00141     kcam->cameratoworld = cameratoworld;
00142     kcam->worldtoscreen = transform_inverse(screentoworld);
00143     kcam->worldtoraster = transform_inverse(rastertoworld);
00144     kcam->worldtondc = transform_inverse(ndctoworld);
00145     kcam->worldtocamera = transform_inverse(cameratoworld);
00146 
00147     /* depth of field */
00148     kcam->aperturesize = aperturesize;
00149     kcam->focaldistance = focaldistance;
00150     kcam->blades = (blades < 3)? 0.0f: blades;
00151     kcam->bladesrotation = bladesrotation;
00152 
00153     /* motion blur */
00154     kcam->shutteropen = shutteropen;
00155     kcam->shutterclose = shutterclose;
00156 
00157     /* type */
00158     kcam->type = type;
00159 
00160     /* store differentials */
00161     kcam->dx = float3_to_float4(dx);
00162     kcam->dy = float3_to_float4(dy);
00163 
00164     /* clipping */
00165     kcam->nearclip = nearclip;
00166     kcam->cliplength = (farclip == FLT_MAX)? FLT_MAX: farclip - nearclip;
00167 
00168     need_device_update = false;
00169 }
00170 
00171 void Camera::device_free(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00172 {
00173     /* nothing to free, only writing to constant memory */
00174 }
00175 
00176 bool Camera::modified(const Camera& cam)
00177 {
00178     return !((shutteropen == cam.shutteropen) &&
00179         (shutterclose == cam.shutterclose) &&
00180         (aperturesize == cam.aperturesize) &&
00181         (blades == cam.blades) &&
00182         (bladesrotation == cam.bladesrotation) &&
00183         (focaldistance == cam.focaldistance) &&
00184         (type == cam.type) &&
00185         (fov == cam.fov) &&
00186         (nearclip == cam.nearclip) &&
00187         (farclip == cam.farclip) &&
00188         // modified for progressive render
00189         // (width == cam.width) &&
00190         // (height == cam.height) &&
00191         (left == cam.left) &&
00192         (right == cam.right) &&
00193         (bottom == cam.bottom) &&
00194         (top == cam.top) &&
00195         (matrix == cam.matrix));
00196 }
00197 
00198 void Camera::tag_update()
00199 {
00200     need_update = true;
00201 }
